metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20553 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: Tcpreplay before 4.3.1 has a heap-based buffer over-read in get_l2len in common/get.c.

notes.Note: ccdm94> version 4.3.2 includes the fix applied by the original patch, however, additional fixes have been released since, and 4.3.2 does not include those.

criterions.comment: tcpreplay: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
